subject: Chemistry
question_text: Given below are two statements: Statement-I: Since fluorine is more electronegative than nitrogen, the net dipole moment of NF 3 is greater than NH 3 . Statement-II: In NH 3 , the orbital dipole due to lone pair and the dipole moment of NH NF 3 the orbital dipole due to lone pair and dipole moments of N-F bonds are in same In the light of the above statements. Choose the most appropriate from the options given below.

options.text: (1) Statement I is true but Statement II is false.
(2) Both Statement I and Statement II are false.
(3) Both statement I and Statement II is are true.
(4) Statement I is false but Statement II is are true.
